title: #99: Big Oil & Their Bankers in the Persian Gulf | Dean Henderson
description:
The role of oil in the American economy cannot be overstated. It dictates foreign policy and creates massive business opportunities for the politically connected. The American Empire must make deals with unsavory dictators in the interest of keeping the Petrodollar arrangement.

As the oil industry slips into the background, the new digital oil rush steps forward with the tech giants making moves to run this new Great Reset of society through the massive amounts of data that it will throw off. What are we giving away to these corporations?

Build Back Better is programming by the New World Order to convince us to reshape society in a totally different way with Joe Biden opening the door and walking it right into the White House. Itâ€™s hard to be optimistic about where this is heading.
